channel.title: Cheat client
channel.description: So I logged off my server for about.... An hour... Two hours max. To find out when I logged on, and was at 'home' on my server. I got there, and got attacked by all the shop NPC's and everything else. Everything had been moved and all that. And ontop of that, I know it was a cheat client. How can I block cheat clients. I know there is something, I tried looking for the tut for it, but it's not simple since mine is not PI, or Delta. :/ So I am trying to find out what I can do so that when someone tries to connect via cheat client, they can not connect to the server. :) Any help is greatly appreciated. :D

item.title: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

So I logged off my server for about… An hour… Two hours max. To find out when I logged on, and was at ‘home’ on my server. I got there, and got attacked by all the shop NPC’s and everything else. Everything had been moved and all that. And ontop of that, I know it was a cheat client. How can I block cheat clients. I know there is something, I tried looking for the tut for it, but it’s not simple since mine is not PI, or Delta. So I am trying to find out what I can do so that when someone tries to connect via cheat client, they can not connect to the server. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
